# isReadOnly

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the persistent store is read-only.

## Declaration

```swift
var isReadOnly: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the receiver is read-only, otherwise [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Managing Store Attributes

- **identifier**: The unique identifier for the persistent store.
- **url**: The URL for the persistent store.
